snippet: The outbreak of violence in Karachi came after days of peaceful demonstrations against the release of a video, made in America, that mocked the Prophet Muhammad.
abstract: One person is killed and dozens of others are injured when anti-American protesters try to storm the American consulate in Karachi, Pakistan; outbreak of violence comes after days of peaceful demonstrations against the release of a video mocking the Prophet Muhammad.

byline.contributor: Waqar Gillani contributed reporting from Lahore, Pakistan.

lead_paragraph: The outbreak of violence in Karachi came after days of peaceful demonstrations against the release of a video, made in America, that mocked the Prophet Muhammad.

headline.seo: Crowds Storm U.S. Consulate in Pakistan, and One Dies
headline.main: Pakistanis Try to Storm U.S. Outpost; One Is Killed
headline.print_headline: Pakistanis Try to Storm U.S. Outpost; One Is Killed
